description:
There's no way around it, riding indoors comes with a good amount of sweat. Save your floor by using this rubberized trainer mat.

  • Made of water-resistant and anti-slip material to keep your trainer steady
  • Edges are bevelled for a smooth transition from floor to mat
  • 6mm thick mat provides noise insulation
  • Unrolled dimensions 91 x 198cm
name: Wahoo Fitness Trainer Floor Mat
